name: Force Ghosts
description:
This is a story set in the Star Wars universe and a project of mine to see if I can actually write and program a short story like this. Explore a small corner of the galaxy as a child who can hear whispers of the force.

Come find out more on my tumblr blog.

Cheers,

Lina

Content Warnings: Canon-typical violence, injuries, blood, death, trauma.
